entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Aged ex-Auror who retired from the Ministry due to his inability to tell the difference between a handshake and attempted murder.

entities.name: arnold weasley
entities.description: Charged with possession of a flying car two years ago and involved in a tussle with Muggle law-keepers over aggressive dustbins.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The governing body that is unable to account for the disappearance of one of its witches.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley rushed to the aid of Mad-Eye Moody during a tussle with Muggle law-keepers.
Mad-Eye Moody retired from the Ministry when he was no longer able to tell the difference between a handshake and attempted murder.
The Ministry was plunged into fresh embarrassment by Arnold Weasley's antics.
